授業目的: This course will teach students how to write academic research essays. Students will learn how to write a thesis statement and how to develop paragraphs that support the thesis. Students will also learn how to do research for supporting material for their paragraphs and incorporate their own ideas related to the research students do. This course will also teach students how to cite their outside sources and write a reference page matching the citations in the essay.
